SELECT c.id, c.game_id AS gameId, c.rent_days AS rentDays, c.created_at AS createdAt, g.id AS "game.id", g.title AS "game.title", g.platform AS "game.platform", g.cover_url AS "game.coverUrl", g.daily_rent_price AS "game.dailyRentPrice", g.deposit_price AS "game.depositPrice", g.available_stock AS "game.availableStock" FROM cart c LEFT JOIN games g ON c.game_id = g.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, game_id, rent_days, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{gameId}, #{rentDays}, NOW())
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
